      • connectionChanged

        public void connectionChanged(NodeMonitor nodeMonitor,
                              ChannelMonitor monitor,
                              boolean connected)
        The channel's connection has changed. Either it has established a new connection or the existing connection has dropped.
        Specified by:
        connectionChanged in interface NodeMonitorListener
        Parameters:
        nodeMonitor - the node monitor whose channel has changed connection state
        monitor - The channel monitor whose connection status has changed.
        connected - The channel's new connection state
